languages.text: "Признаю, я несколько смущен, что Лорд-капитан продолжает крутить роман с Джай после того, как вскрылась правда о ее происхождении. Это и раньше был мезальянс, а теперь..."

"I admit that I am somewhat disconcerted that the Lord Captain has continued {mf|his|her} affair with Jae after the truth about her background came to light. It was a poor enough match before, but now..."
languages.original_text: "Признаю, я несколько смущен, что Лорд-капитан продолжает крутить роман с Джай после того, как вскрылась правда о ее происхождении. Это и раньше был мезальянс, а теперь..."

languages.text: “婕伊的真实身份曝光之后，舰长大人依旧保持着与她之间的关系。我得承认，这让我十分忧心。这原本就谈不上门当户对，现在就更……”
languages.original_text: "I admit that I am somewhat disconcerted that the Lord Captain has continued {mf|his|her} affair with Jae after the truth about her background came to light. It was a poor enough match before, but now..."

traits.locale_text: “婕伊的真实身份曝光之后，舰长大人依旧保持着与她之间的关系。我得承认，这让我十分忧心。这原本就谈不上门当户对，现在就更……”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'admets ne pas bien comprendre pourquoi {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} n'a pas immédiatement mis fin à sa relation avec Jae après avoir appris la vérité sur son passé. Je trouvais déjà qu'{mf|ils|elles} n'étaient pas {mf|faits|faites} l'{mf|un|une} pour l'autre, mais là... »
languages.original_text: "I admit that I am somewhat disconcerted that the Lord Captain has continued {mf|his|her} affair with Jae after the truth about her background came to light. It was a poor enough match before, but now..."

traits.locale_text: « J'admets ne pas bien comprendre pourquoi {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} n'a pas immédiatement mis fin à sa relation avec Jae après avoir appris la vérité sur son passé. Je trouvais déjà qu'{mf|ils|elles} n'étaient pas {mf|faits|faites} l'{mf|un|une} pour l'autre, mais là... »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Admito cierto desconcierto ante el hecho de que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán haya continuado su relación con Jae después de que saliera a la luz la verdad sobre ella. Ya era una mala opción antes, pero ahora...».
languages.original_text: "I admit that I am somewhat disconcerted that the Lord Captain has continued {mf|his|her} affair with Jae after the truth about her background came to light. It was a poor enough match before, but now..."

traits.locale_text: «Admito cierto desconcierto ante el hecho de que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán haya continuado su relación con Jae después de que saliera a la luz la verdad sobre ella. Ya era una mala opción antes, pero ahora...».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「私はジェイの素性が明るみに出た後もロード・キャプテンがジェイとの関係を続けていることにいささか違和感を覚えています。明らかにお粗末な組み合わせだったのに…」
languages.original_text: "I admit that I am somewhat disconcerted that the Lord Captain has continued {mf|his|her} affair with Jae after the truth about her background came to light. It was a poor enough match before, but now..."

traits.locale_text: 「私はジェイの素性が明るみに出た後もロード・キャプテンがジェイとの関係を続けていることにいささか違和感を覚えています。明らかにお粗末な組み合わせだったのに…」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich muss gestehen, ich bin etwas befremdet, dass der Lord Captain seine Affäre mit Jae fortsetzt, nachdem die Wahrheit über ihre Herkunft ans Licht gekommen ist. Sie haben ohnehin schon nicht zusammengepasst, doch nun ..."
languages.original_text: "I admit that I am somewhat disconcerted that the Lord Captain has continued {mf|his|her} affair with Jae after the truth about her background came to light. It was a poor enough match before, but now..."

languages.text: "Karanlık geçmişinin açığa çıkmasına rağmen Lord Kaptan'ın Jae'la olan ilişkisini sürdürmesi beni rahatsız etti doğrusu. Zaten yakışmıyorlardı ama şimdi..."
